question: Can you help plan a two-week healthy meal prep schedule?
true_answer: Meal plan created: Balanced diet with daily variety, includes proteins, carbs, and vegetables with options for snacks and beverages.

plan.current_objective: Create a comprehensive two-week healthy meal prep schedule

memory_state.shared_knowledge: Balanced meals include lean proteins, whole grains, and vegetables. Snacks and hydration strategies are incorporated.

steps.content: Can you help plan a two-week healthy meal prep schedule?
Creating initial plan for meal prep: 1) Research healthy meal options. 2) Design daily meal plans. 3) Compile into a two-week schedule.
Decomposing plan into research, daily plan creation, and schedule compilation.
Assigning the task of researching healthy meal options to the researcher.
Searching for diverse healthy meal options that align with balanced diet principles.
Identified meals with lean proteins, whole grains, and vegetables. Options include chicken stir-fry, quinoa salad, and vegetable soup.
Marking research completed. Updating shared knowledge with meal options.
Assigning the task of creating daily meal plans to the analyzer.
Designing daily meal plans ensuring variety and nutritional balance.
Daily plans created successfully with breakfast, lunch, dinner, and snack options.
Marking daily meal plans completed. Proceeding to compile final schedule.
Assigning final schedule compilation to browser agent.
Compiling two-week meal schedule with meals evenly distributed for balance and variety.
Meal plan created: Balanced diet with daily variety, includes proteins, carbs, and vegetables with options for snacks and beverages.
